getClassID module

getClassID module¶

This module provide a function to get the class ID from the CLEF metadatas files

getClassID.GetClassID(filename)[source]¶

This function retrieves the ClassID from the metadata file.

Parameters:filename (string) – nom du fichier XML
Returns:the category from the XML file
Return type:string
